subject: Re: [R] Inverse BoxCox transformation
body:
Dear Des,

The following should do the trick:

	invBoxCox <- function(x, lambda)
    		if (lambda == 0) exp(x) else (lambda*x + 1)^(1/lambda)

I hope this helps,
 John

--------------------------------
John Fox, Professor
Department of Sociology
McMaster University
Hamilton, Ontario
Canada L8S 4M4
905-525-9140x23604
http://socserv.mcmaster.ca/jfox
